rows.label: tev001601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, hey! Are you here to see the new experimental
Skell? Me too! It's so exciting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG0002
rows.name:
I know it doesn't look like much, but it uses a bunch of
new Sakuraba components that make it capable of
linear movement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG0003
rows.name:
It looks like one reeeally nice piece of tech.
I can't wait to get one I can tinker around with![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1001
rows.name:
Hey, are you leaving the city?
Then take me with you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1002
rows.name:
There are so many things I could learn from going
on missions with a skilled fighter like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1003
rows.name:
And then I'd be able to get my dream Skell that much
sooner, which makes EVERYONE happy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Alexa to your team.

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Alexa's request for now.

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1004
rows.name:
All right, let's do this! I can almost hear the hum
of that Skell I'm gonna buy...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1005
rows.name: Come on! Let's walk around and talk about Skells![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1010
rows.name: I wonder if those xenoforms in Oblivia use Skells?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1011
rows.name:
That would be incredible, huh? We should totally go
save them so we can find out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0051
rows.name: Add Alexa to your team.

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0061
rows.name: Decline Alexa's request for now.

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1012
rows.name:
Then let's get going! Oh, and I also want to see what
kind of Skells the Ganglion are using.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1013
rows.name:
No? Are you sure? Reeeeeeally sure? ...Yeah, okay.
Guess I'll just be here working on these Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1018
rows.name:
I heard you're going on a mission to recover an
alien Skell? That is so cool. And I am so jealous![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1019
rows.name:
When you get back, you gotta let me poke around
inside it, okay? Promise me. Pinky-swear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1024
rows.name:
Hey, are you looking for a partner or whatever?
Then I'm coming along![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1025
rows.name:
I just thought of a new Skell maneuver I really want to
try once we're outside the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1026
rows.name:
Sweeeeet! We can go anywhere with Skells, you know?
Now what weapons should we bring...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1027
rows.name:
Awww. I really wanted to try copying some of your
sweet Skell maneuvers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1032
rows.name:
The Ganglion use Skells that employ an entirely
different architecture from the kind we use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1033
rows.name:
I really want to fight against one on the field and see
how they move, so...maybe you could kinda sorta
take me with you on your next mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0071
rows.name: Add Alexa to your team.

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline Alexa's request for now.

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1034
rows.name:
I'm gonna bring back SO MANY Ganglion Skell parts!
Hop on the hype train, wooo woooo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1035
rows.name: Awww! Well, if you change your mind, let me know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1040
rows.name:
I can't believe they swiped that alien Skell we found
in Noctilum before I had a chance to get a look at it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1041
rows.name:
That's so unfair! Still, I wonder if there's another one
somewhere else that's waiting to be found?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1042
rows.name:
Oh, hey! Are you here about a mission? Then take me!
I don't care where, and I don't care what. I just wanna
get out of this dump for a bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0091
rows.name: Add Alexa to your team.

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0101
rows.name: Decline Alexa's request for now.

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1043
rows.name: Roger that! Off we go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1044
rows.name:
No? Are you sure? Reeeeeeally sure? ...Yeah, okay.
Guess I'll just be here working on these Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1049
rows.name:
Those Wrothian Skells were unbelievable! Did you get a
look at those giant sensors installed on their shoulders?
And the firepower was completely off the charts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1050
rows.name:
It's like they were designed to find an enemy's weak
point and bring it down in one concentrated attack.
They are SO cool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1051
rows.name:
Do you think we'll see them on our next mission?
I bet we will. Gosh, I sure hope you take me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0111
rows.name: Add Alexa to your team.

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0121
rows.name: Decline Alexa's request for now.

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1052
rows.name:
I wonder what sorta Skells we'll encounter this time?
I cannot WAIT to find out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1053
rows.name:
No? Are you sure? Reeeeeeally sure? ...Yeah, okay.
Guess I'll just be here working on these Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1058
rows.name:
Whoa, what kind of machine was that?
I've never even heard of it before![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1059
rows.name:
The amount of energy that thing must put out seems
way beyond what a typical Skell can do. It's like it's
from the future or something![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1060
rows.name:
I wanna ride it so bad. Even just for a few minutes.
Come on, we gotta get it back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0131
rows.name: Add Alexa to your team.

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0141
rows.name: Decline Alexa's request for now.

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1061
rows.name:
All right! Er, and would it be out of line for me to ask
that we try not to damage that Skell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1062
rows.name:
I'd do anything for a Skell. A-NY-THING.
So let me know whenever you need me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1067
rows.name: It's been a long time coming...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1068
rows.name:
But the hopes and dreams of humanity are finally
within our grasp.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1069
rows.name:
With Skells, there is no future to which we cannot
blaze a path. Let's equip our Skell flight modules
and push ever onward![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0151
rows.name: Add Alexa to your team.

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline Alexa's request for now.

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1070
rows.name:
Now, let's make a beeline to the Lifehold Core and
secure humanity's future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1071
rows.name:
There is nothing you and your Skells can't achieve!
No obstacle you can't blow away! So get out there
and make history![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1076
rows.name:
I never imagined I'd encounter so many incredible
Skells on this world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1077
rows.name:
There was that awesome Wrothian Skell,
all those unique Ganglion models...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1078
rows.name:
Not to mention the Skells we developed here that
feature Lin's flight module![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1079
rows.name:
And I bet there's so many more to see, too. I'm always
ready to jump in my Skell and go exploring with you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0170
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0171
rows.name: Add Alexa to your team.

rows.label: tev001601_JNK0180
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001601_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline Alexa's request for now.

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1080
rows.name:
Thanks! Now let's customize our Skells with the best
possible loadouts and get those engines blazing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001601_MSG1081
rows.name:
No? Are you sure? Reeeeeeally sure? ...Yeah, okay.
Guess I'll just be here working on these Skells.[ST:wait ]
